stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
One of the most powerful tools to win back customers is to re-target people who have added items into their cart but haven't purchased. Cart Re-targeting works by adding a line of code to your website which tracks when customers add an item to their cart but don't check out.

Unlike other types of re-targeting this doesn't show people some generic Ad when they leave it emails them directly with a custom email design suited for your customers.

You can set when how often and what you want to email customers who haven't purchased. For example you can email a 5% coupon off their cart contents after 3 days and then a 10% coupon after 7 days.

Cart retargeting has been proven to have one of the highest ROI's in winning back customers. The best part? Pay nothing until you recover $500 worth of lost revenue.

What can I expect?

  • Code Installation
title: Abandoned Cart Setup - Win Back Lost Customers
